attributes.action: Ban the live export of animals
attributes.additional_details: Live export can death and suffering to animals.  It is cruel and unnecessary.
attributes.background: The government told us that we could not ban live export because of EU legislation.  We are no longer in the EU so live export, with exemption for breeding and sport, can be banned

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
